page.title: 04Biography Chaldon Hills
page.content: Most of the land in this block is owned by the Weld family. They have been Squires since 1641 and are an old and distinguished Roman Catholic family. Since Humphrey Weld purchased the Estate the family have played a prominent part in local affairs. The present family seat, Lulworth Castle, lies to the East of the block. It is from there that the Estate is managed. Colonel Sir Joseph Weld, O.B.E., T.D. is the present head of the family. He was, for many years, Lord Lieutenant of Dorset. The Estate currently extends to approximately 5,040 hectares within the Civil Parishes of Chaldon Herring, East and West Lulworth, Winfrith Newburgh and Wool. It is administered by a Board of Trustees.
